text: Oyebaki te ete: Bato baye tango balobaki na bango, botika kobunda, kasi botelemisa losambo mpe bofuta zakat. Na sima tango motindo mokweyaki ete babunda, eteni moko kati na bango bakomaki kobanga bato ndenge moko babangaka Allah to mpe koleka wana, mpe balobaki ete: eh Nkolo wa biso! mpona nini otindi biso na bitumba? Soki okoki kozongisa yango ata sima, loba: Bisengo ya mokili bizali moke kasi mokolo ya lobi nde ezali malamu mpona oyo abangi. Mpe bakobuba bango ata na eleko moke te
